diagrams.description: A mindmap showing the fundamental concepts and structure of Ethics.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
mindmap
  root((Ethics))
    Normative Ethics
      Consequentialism
        Utilitarianism
      Deontology
        Kantian Ethics
      Virtue Ethics
        Aristotelian Ethics
    Meta-Ethics
      Moral Realism
      Moral Anti-Realism
      Emotivism
    Applied Ethics
      Bioethics
      Business Ethics
      Environmental Ethics
      Animal Rights
